price: 2 Noé dit : « Mon peuple ! Je suis chargé de vous avertir en toute clarté
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi innī lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
